title: Track Awesome Directus Updates Daily
_seo_title: Track Awesome Directus (directus-community/awesome-directus) Updates Daily - Track Awesome List
description: A curated list of awesome things related to Directus

items.title: Awesome Directus Updates on Nov 11, 2024
items.content_text:
### Extensions / Community

*   [Auto generate file transformations (⭐4)](https://github.com/utomic-media/directus-extension-auto-generate-file-transformations) - Automatically generate selected file transformations on upload
items.content_html:
Extensions / Community

  • Auto generate file transformations (⭐4) - Automatically generate selected file transformations on upload

items.title: Awesome Directus Updates on Apr 02, 2024
items.content_text:
### Integration / Community

*   [Official JS SDK](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@directus/sdk) - The JS SDK provides an intuitive interface for the Directus API from within a JavaScript-powered project (Browsers and Node.js).
*   [Official Gatsby Source Plugin](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@directus/gatsby-source-directus) - Source plugin for pulling data into Gatsby from a Directus API.
items.content_html:
Integration / Community

  • Official JS SDK - The JS SDK provides an intuitive interface for the Directus API from within a JavaScript-powered project (Browsers and Node.js).
  • Official Gatsby Source Plugin - Source plugin for pulling data into Gatsby from a Directus API.

items.title: Awesome Directus Updates on Oct 30, 2023
items.content_text:

items.title: Awesome Directus Updates on Oct 23, 2023
items.content_text:
### Extensions / Community

*   [Tab Group (⭐13)](https://github.com/formfcw/directus-extension-tab-group) - A group interface with a tab menu for toggling the visibility of fields within the group.
*   [Drawer Notice (⭐10)](https://github.com/formfcw/directus-extension-drawer-notice) - A notice field that is only visible in the drawer.
*   [Classified Group (⭐12)](https://github.com/formfcw/directus-extension-classified-group) - A group to which a class can be assigned for custom styling.
*   [Tokenized Preview (⭐10)](https://github.com/formfcw/directus-extension-tokenized-preview) - An endpoint that adds an active auth token to your preview URL.
items.content_html:
Extensions / Community

  • Tab Group (⭐13) - A group interface with a tab menu for toggling the visibility of fields within the group.
  • Drawer Notice (⭐10) - A notice field that is only visible in the drawer.
  • Classified Group (⭐12) - A group to which a class can be assigned for custom styling.
  • Tokenized Preview (⭐10) - An endpoint that adds an active auth token to your preview URL.

items.title: Awesome Directus Updates on Sep 21, 2023
items.content_text:
### Extensions / Community

*   [Media AI Bundle (⭐62)](https://github.com/Arood/directus-extension-media-ai-bundle) - Two operations to perform image description and OCR.
*   [Directus Copilot (⭐82)](https://github.com/programmarchy/directus-extension-copilot/) - A bundle including a panel to ask data-aware questions in a chat interface.
*   [OpenAI Automatic Translation (⭐44)](https://github.com/timio23/directus-operation-auto-translate/) - An operaiton to automatically translate new items via OpenAI.
*   [Machine Learning Operations (⭐13)](https://github.com/karamokoisrael/directus-hackathon-submission/) - A set of extensions to train, test and use machine learning models.
items.content_html:
Extensions / Community

  • Media AI Bundle (⭐62) - Two operations to perform image description and OCR.
  • Directus Copilot (⭐82) - A bundle including a panel to ask data-aware questions in a chat interface.
  • OpenAI Automatic Translation (⭐44) - An operaiton to automatically translate new items via OpenAI.
  • Machine Learning Operations (⭐13) - A set of extensions to train, test and use machine learning models.

items.content_text:

items.title: Awesome Directus Updates on Aug 07, 2023
items.content_text:
### Examples / Showcases / Personal

*   [Agency OS (⭐703)](https://github.com/directus-community/agency-os) - Fully complete, opinionated agency website template featuring Nuxt and Directus. View [Demo](https://www.agencyos.dev/).
*   [Nextus (⭐83)](https://github.com/luochuanyuewu/nextus) - A comprehensive, versatile and modern website template based on Nextjs and Directus technologies. It helps you build various types of websites more quickly. View [Demo](https://nextus.vercel.app/en).
items.content_html:
Examples / Showcases / Personal

  • Agency OS (⭐703) - Fully complete, opinionated agency website template featuring Nuxt and Directus. View Demo.
  • Nextus (⭐83) - A comprehensive, versatile and modern website template based on Nextjs and Directus technologies. It helps you build various types of websites more quickly. View Demo.

items.content_text:
### Extensions / Community

*   [Flexible Editor (⭐185)](https://github.com/formfcw/directus-extension-flexible-editor) - A Rich Text Editor (WYSIWYG) with JSON output, that allows to integrate M2A relations to make it extremely flexible.
items.content_html:
Extensions / Community

  • Flexible Editor (⭐185) - A Rich Text Editor (WYSIWYG) with JSON output, that allows to integrate M2A relations to make it extremely flexible.

items.title: Awesome Directus Updates on Feb 09, 2022
items.content_text:
### Resources / Official

*   [Community Repositories](https://github.com/directus-community)

### Extensions / Community

*   [Search Sync (⭐119)](https://github.com/dimitrov-adrian/directus-extension-searchsync) - Sync data into a search engine index, supports Algolia, ElasticSearch & MeiliSearch.
*   [Dictionary (⭐40)](https://github.com/georgexchelebiev/directus-dictionary) - Save key-value pairs as JSON blobs with a progress indicator for completeness.
*   [WordPress-like Slug (⭐99)](https://github.com/dimitrov-adrian/directus-extension-wpslug-interface) - Slug/Permalink interface with support for pre- and suffixes.
*   [Link Meta (⭐29)](https://github.com/dimitrov-adrian/directus-extension-linkmeta) - Stores hyperlink metadata into Directus.
*   [Group Modal (⭐63)](https://github.com/dimitrov-adrian/directus-extension-group-modal-interface) - Group interface fields into a modal that can be opened with a button.
*   [Display Link (⭐63)](https://github.com/jacoborus/directus-extension-display-link) - Display URLs with an "open in new tab" button.
*   [SQL Panel (⭐18)](https://github.com/harish2704/directus-sql-panel) - Panel component which shows result of stored SQL query as a table.
*   [SVG Map Picker Interface (⭐34)](https://github.com/dimitrov-adrian/directus-extension-svgmap-picker-interface) - Select a value from a SVG Map box.
items.content_html:
Resources / Official

  • Community Repositories

Extensions / Community

  • Search Sync (⭐119) - Sync data into a search engine index, supports Algolia, ElasticSearch & MeiliSearch.
  • Dictionary (⭐40) - Save key-value pairs as JSON blobs with a progress indicator for completeness.
  • WordPress-like Slug (⭐99) - Slug/Permalink interface with support for pre- and suffixes.
  • Link Meta (⭐29) - Stores hyperlink metadata into Directus.
  • Group Modal (⭐63) - Group interface fields into a modal that can be opened with a button.
  • Display Link (⭐63) - Display URLs with an "open in new tab" button.
  • SQL Panel (⭐18) - Panel component which shows result of stored SQL query as a table.
  • SVG Map Picker Interface (⭐34) - Select a value from a SVG Map box.

items.title: Awesome Directus Updates on Nov 25, 2021
items.content_text:
### Extensions / Community

*   [Image Scout (⭐132)](https://github.com/resauce-dev/directus-image-scout?ref=awesome-directus) - Search and select images found on a variety of royalty free image sites (Pexels, Pixabay, Unsplash & Giphy!).
*   [Date Picker Interface (⭐16)](https://github.com/u12206050/directus-9-date-picker-interface) - An alternative Date Picker Interface to the original Directus DateTime interface.
items.content_html:
Extensions / Community

  • Image Scout (⭐132) - Search and select images found on a variety of royalty free image sites (Pexels, Pixabay, Unsplash & Giphy!).
  • Date Picker Interface (⭐16) - An alternative Date Picker Interface to the original Directus DateTime interface.
